desc: The way we sit is simply wrong. It’s harming our bodies and impacting our lives. The Workhorse Saddle Chair helps you maintain the ideal spinal position and posture for better health. performance at work and quality of life. Back us on Kickstarter today.

layout.text: Designed by a Chiropractor, the Workhorse Saddle Chair puts your body in the perfect sitting posture.  For better health, performance at work, and quality of life.
